summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GodBot EchelonCore AI Agent Framework. All backend APIs (11/11) and frontend UI components are working perfectly. Successfully tested new Dashboard and DreamChain modals, persona switching, tier selection, and chat functionality with credits tracking. App runs flawlessly in demo mode with intelligent fallback responses.
passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with EchelonCore branding and pledge quote
Dashboard button opens usage dashboard modal
Dashboard shows tier info, credits remaining, model utilization
Dashboard shows cost savings comparison vs direct API
DreamChain button opens insights modal
DreamChain shows AI-generated feature/refactor/plugin/insight suggestions
Acknowledge button works on dream insights
Chat sends message and receives response with credits_used tracking
Persona selector works with all 4 personas (GODMIND, LUMINA, SENTINEL, MAGGIE)
Tier selector shows Free/Pro/Dev+/God options
GET /api/status returns operational status with pledge
GET /api/dashboard returns full metrics
GET /api/dreamchain returns insights
POST /api/chat returns emotional_resonance data
Session management works (create, view, delete)
Trinity Fusion status panel shows model states
Cyberpunk/Synthwave neon dark theme with purple/magenta accents
Mobile responsive sidebar and UI elements
Emotional resonance engine working (persona personalities)
Credits tracking across all interactions
Demo mode fallback responses working intelligently
